mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GRADE A JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR C ON B.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE JOIN LECT_REGISTER E ON A.SUB_CODE= E.SUB_CODE WHERE E.STU_ID = #{stuId} AND E.STATUS='Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GRADE A JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR C ON B.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE JOIN LECT_REGISTER E ON A.SUB_CODE= E.SUB_CODE WHERE E.STU_ID = #{stuId} AND E.STATUS='Y' AND A.GRADE_YEAR LIKE #{selectYear} AND A.GRADE_SEMESTER LIKE #{selectSemester} AND B.SUB_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{search} || '%'

SELECT A.SUB_CODE, B.SUB_TITLE as "Title", D.DEPT_TITLE, B.SUB_DIVS, B.SUB_CREDIT, B.SUB_TIME, C.PROF_NAME, E.GRADE_CREDIT FROM LECT_REGISTER A JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR C ON B.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE JOIN GRADE E ON A.SUB_CODE = E.SUB_CODE WHERE A.STU_ID = #{stuId} AND A.STATUS='Y'

SELECT A.SUB_CODE, B.SUB_TITLE as "Title", D.DEPT_TITLE, B.SUB_DIVS, B.SUB_CREDIT, B.SUB_TIME, C.PROF_NAME, E.GRADE_CREDIT FROM LECT_REGISTER A JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE JOIN PROFESSOR C ON B.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE JOIN GRADE E ON A.SUB_CODE = E.SUB_CODE WHERE A.STU_ID = #{stuId} AND A.STATUS='Y' AND E.GRADE_YEAR LIKE #{selectYear} AND E.GRADE_SEMESTER LIKE #{selectSemester} AND B.SUB_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{search} || '%'
